channel.title: Speaking on My blog

item.title: Nordic VMUG UserCon Session
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: VMUG Denmark is arranging the Nordic VMUG UserCon in Copenhagen December 1st 2015, and the agenda went live earlier today. I’m definitely going to be there, and as it turns out I even have my own session lined up: **Session Title: **VCS to VCVA Converter or how a fling can be good for you! ** Session Abstract: **Migrating from Windows vCenter to the VCVA? No worries, the VMware VCS to VCVA Converter fling has you covered!
